detail.detailText: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}invalidVariables; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPCOR-6175: Invalid document &lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?&gt;&lt;jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://soap.aic.infosys.tuwien.ac.at/" type="msgns:ship_items" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"&gt;&lt;jbi:part&gt;&lt;ship_items xmlns="http://soap.aic.infosys.tuwien.ac.at/"&gt;&lt;items xmlns=""/&gt;&lt;/ship_items&gt;&lt;/jbi:part&gt;&lt;/jbi:message&gt; is assigned to shippingItems in BP instance (10.0.0.10:-4050d586:12d7201cc8f:-7fce) at line 93 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/OrderProcess/orderProcess}orderProcess</jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance Caused by: BPCOR-6175: Invalid document <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://soap.aic.infosys.tuwien.ac.at/" type="msgns:ship_items" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part><ship_items xmlns="http://soap.aic.infosys.tuwien.ac.at/"><items xmlns=""/></ship_items></jbi:part></jbi:message> is assigned to shippingItems in BP instance (10.0.0.10:-4050d586:12d7201cc8f:-7fce) at line 93 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/OrderProcess/orderProcess}orderProcess BPCOR-6129: Line Number is 93 BPCOR-6130: Activity Name is Assign6 Caused by: Too many elements: {null}quantity
